questions.question_text: Yāgārtham apyajādīnām nirdoṣhāṇām hi ________ । Hinsanam naiva kartavyam satsangibhihi kadāchana ॥ 35 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states that violence should not be done to innocent creatures in yagnas.

questions.question_text: Yāgādike cha kartavye siddhāntam sāmpradāyikam । Anusṛutya hi kartavyam hinsā-rahitam eva tat ॥ 36 ॥
questions.explanation: This is the 36th shlok of Satsang Diksha.

questions.question_text: Matvā’pi yagna-sheṣham cha vā’pi deva-niveditam । Mānsam kadāpi bhakṣhyam na ________ āshritair-janaihi ॥ 37 ॥
questions.explanation: Satsangis should never eat meat even if it is offered to deities.

questions.question_text: Kasyā’pi tāḍanam naiva karaṇīyam kadāchana । Apa-shabdā’pamānādi-sūkṣhma-hinsā’pi naiva cha ॥ 38 ॥
questions.explanation: This is the 38th shlok of Satsang Diksha.
One should not resort to violence for the sake of wealth, fame, etc.

questions.question_text: Manasā vachasā vā’pi karmaṇā hinsane kṛute । Tat-sthito dukhyate nūnam Swāminārāyaṇo Harihi ॥ 40 ॥
questions.explanation: This is the 40th shlok of Satsang Diksha.

questions.question_text: Ātma-ghāto’pi ________ na kāryo’tah kadāchana । Patana-gala-bandhādyair viṣha-bhakṣhādibhis-tathā ॥ 41 ॥
questions.explanation: Suicide is also a form of violence and should never be committed.

questions.question_text: Dukha-lajjā-bhaya-krodha-rogādyāpatti kāraṇāt । Dharmā’rtham api kashchiddhi hanyān-na swam na vā param ॥ 42 ॥
questions.explanation: This is the 42nd shlok of Satsang Diksha.

questions.question_text: Tīrthe’pi naiva kartavya ________ mumukṣhubhihi । Naivā’pi mokṣha-puṇyāpti bhāvāt kāryah sa tatra cha ॥ 43 ॥
questions.explanation: Even in a pilgrimage site, suicide should not be committed.

questions.question_text: Hinsā na karnī jantukī, ________ sangko tyāg;
questions.explanation: From the kirtan: 'Hinsa na karni jantuki, partriya sangko tyag'
